         child: BasicScreenWidget(

             padding: const EdgeInsets.all(32.0),
             child: LayoutBuilder(
               key: parentKey,
               builder: (context, constraints) {
-                return Stack(
-                  children: [
-                    Opacity(
-                      opacity: 1.0,
-                      child: MouseSingleChildScrollView(

-                          crossAxisAlignment: CrossAxisAlignment.start,

-                            SizedBox(

-                            ),
-                            for (int _ in 36.times)

-                          ],

                     ),

               },
